title: English at Work. - Eps. 19-21.
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/English language - Study and teaching - Foreign speakers

Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Banks and banking
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Old age pensions
description: Episode 19, "Understanding superannuation" explains in everyday language the different types of superannuation policies available. In "Opening a bank account" the various types of bank and credit accounts are examined and appraised. The final episode on the tape, "Making statistics work for you", shows how using mathematics in the workplace and at home need not be complicated but rather can make your work less disorganised.
